original_text:
but whose delight is in the law of the Lord,
    and who meditates on his law day and night.
korean_text: 오직 여호와의 율법을 즐거워하여 그의 율법을 주야로 묵상하는도다

sentences.original_text: but whose delight is in the law of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 즐거움은 여호와의 율법에 있으며

sentences.original_text: and who meditates on his law day and night
